name: Sewage Swimmer (EnvironmentalIssuesGames, maxekinney)
description:
Avoid the Sewage to get points! Use the A and D buttons to move the swan!

Sewage Swimmer is a game created by concerned students to highlight the fact that water companies are dumping sewage into our rivers, damaging our wildlife, and contaminating our waters in the U.K.

If you want to find out more and support campaigns to clean up our rivers then follow: 
https://www.sas.org.uk/endsewagepollution/
#End Sewage Pollution Thames

Windrush Against Sewage Pollution (WASP) https://www.windrushwasp.org
